tree.name: Noah Penda
tree.note: Acquired from Boston for Amari Williams, Max Shulga, and 2 second-round picks in June 2025. Originally drafted #32 by BOS in 2025.

assetsGivenUp.name: Amari Williams
assetsGivenUp.note: Drafted #46 by ORL in 2025 out of Kentucky. Traded to BOS for Noah Penda.

assetsGivenUp.name: Max Shulga
assetsGivenUp.note: Drafted #57 by ORL in 2025 out of VCU. Traded to BOS for Noah Penda.
